note.p: Only son of the needle manufacturer and proprietor of Bentley Manor, Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, Richard Hemming. Officer in the county militia. Lived a life of leisure, running a private yacht, entertaining lavishly, horse racing, gambling, and hare coursing. Owner of the famous greyhound Peasant Boy.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/103/72/6)
